A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Way too many plot holes.  Story goes completely off the rails in several instances\, characters don't stay true to their character\, unreasonable or non-existent motives for many actions (or lack thereof) in the story for the sake of stretching a nonsense plot over an unnecessary amount of time.  Many unexplained instances of absolutely ridiculous behaviour.  Completely over saturated with try-hard comedic scenes.\n\nThis is more of a bad parody than a true Star Wars film.  Do not recommend for anyone looking for story integrity.
